rules: Headings (h1-h3) must use Manrope, weight 600 or 700.
Body text must use Public Sans, weight 400 for regular, 500 for emphasis.
Data tables must use Public Sans, text-sm (14px).
SKUs and Codes must use JetBrains Mono.

gradients.exception: Subtle mesh gradient allowed only on Login Screen or Empty States.

structure.sidebar: Fixed left, width 250px, dark slate background.
structure.header: Sticky top, glassmorphism (white/80 backdrop-blur), 1px bottom border.

cards.style: Flat, 1px border (slate-200), no shadow by default.

buttons.primary: bg-slate-800 text-white hover:bg-slate-700 rounded-md font-medium px-6
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-md

tables.header: bg-slate-50 text-slate-500 uppercase text-xs tracking-wider font-semibold

inputs.style: bg-white border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-slate-200 focus:border-slate-400 rounded-md h-10

visual_enhancers.texture: Use a subtle noise texture (opacity 0.03) on the Sidebar background to mimic fabric texture.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use 'shadow-sm' for dropdowns and 'shadow-lg' for modals. Avoid heavy drop shadows on cards.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md for sticky headers and modal overlays.
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: All rows in tables must have a hover state. Buttons must have active scale-95.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is Slate-700 or darker on white backgrounds.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: Do not use generic blue (#3B82F6). Use Slate Blue (#334155) as primary.
Implement the 'Bento Grid' layout for the Dashboard overview.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings. Import it in index.css.
Keep the UI 'Airy' but 'Dense' - use whitespace for grouping, but keep data compact.
For the 'Muestras' (Samples) table, allow for a thumbnail column.
Use Shadcn components but override the default radius to '0.5rem' (rounded-lg) or '0.375rem' (rounded-md) for a crisper look.
universal_guidelines: Use named exports for components, default exports for pages.
